summary: Enraged by the defeat of his master, Agnahmaar, a great admirer of Alduin, has brought the dragons back together to kill the Dovahakiin once and fo
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1227.photobucket.com/albums/ee432/MrGodzilla445/Nexus%20Mods/5d7d9fc0-d3fe-4b7d-992a-1d166d1544ef.png[/img]
[size=4][u]Description

[/u][/size][size=3]After the fall of Alduin, a powerful dragon named Agnahmaar has has taken control of the dragons in order to avenge his fallen master. Agnahmaar cares little for waiting, but for this special occasion, he will savor the moment. Take the Dragonborn on an adventure throughout the lands of Skyrim, complete multiple new sidequests and a DLC sized main quest. [/size]

[size=4][u]Features
[/u][/size][list][*][size=3]DLC Sized Main Questline[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Multiple New Sidequests[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]New Characters[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Voice Acting[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Island Town of Valinna [/size][/*]
[*][size=3](Possibly) New weapons and armor[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]New Spells and powers[/size][/*]
[*][size=3](Hopefully) New Shout[/size]s[/*]
[/list]
[u][size=4]Requirements[/size]

[/u][size=3]As of right now, the only requirement will be to have Dawnguard. Until I get permission from other mod authors, that will be all.[/size]
author: MrGodzilla445
